metadata.title: W3Schools.com
metadata.Keywords: HTML, Python, CSS, SQL, JavaScript, How to, PHP, Java, C, C++, C#, jQuery, Bootstrap, Colors, W3.CSS, XML, MySQL, Icons, NodeJS, React, Graphics, Angular, R, AI, Git, Data Science, Code Game, Tutorials, Programming, Web Development, Training, Learning, Quiz, Exercises, Courses, Lessons, References, Examples, Learn to code, Source code, Demos, Tips, Website
metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Python, PHP, Bootstrap, Java, XML and more.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.

content.text: Descriptive Statistics is broken down into Tendency and Variability .
content.html: Descriptive Statistics is broken down into Tendency and Variability.

content.text: The Mean Value is the Average of all values.
content.html: The Mean Value is the Average of all values.

content.text: To find the Mean Value : Add all values and divide by the number of values.
content.html: To find the Mean Value: Add all values and divide by the number of values.

content.text: The Mean is the Sum divided by the Count .

content.code_html: let mean = (7+8+8+9+9+9+10+11+14+14+15)/11;

const values = [7,8,8,9,9,9,10,11,14,14,15];
let mean = math.mean(values);

content.text: The Median is the value in the middle (after the values are sorted):
content.html: The Median is the value in the middle (after the values are sorted):

content.code_html:
const speed = [99,86,87,88,111,86,103,87,94,78,77,85,86];
let median = math.median(speed);

content.text: If there are two numbers in the middle, divide the sum of them by two.
content.html: If there are two numbers in the middle, divide the sum of them by two.

content.code_html:
const speed = [99,86,87,88,86,103,87,94,78,77,85,86];
let median = math.median(speed);

content.text: The Mode Value is the value that appears the most number of times:
content.html: The Mode Value is the value that appears the most number of times:

content.code_html:
const speed = [99,86,87,88,86,103,87,94,78,77,85,86];
let mode = math.mode(speed);

content.text: Outliers are values " outside " the other values:
Outliers can change the mean a lot. Sometimes we don't use them (they might be an error), or we use the median or the mode instead.
content.html: Outliers can change the mean a lot. Sometimes we don't use them (they might be an error), or we use the median or the mode instead.

content.code_html:
const values = [99,86,87,88,111,86,103,87,94,78,300,85,86];
let mean = math.mean(values);
